ai-tika-abh03t0:91_3: This is the remainder of the five contemplations , etc., that is, when there is no out-of-faction here, no mindfulness which is dissipated here when there is.
ai-tika-abh03t0:91_4: But there are no obstacles for matter how they are.
ai-tika-abh03t0:91_5: But just as feelings are to be shown by the feelings that are austere, etc., and to say, “Teachery, the aggregates are not able to show it.”
ai-tika-abh03t0:91_6: Herein, the meaning is: it is inclusively states that were produced by the means of the fine-material jhānas, etc., respected by the law of the kind, is the meaning.
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_0: But if—whether pleasant, unbroken, or uncontrolled in form, is unfinished in the various forms of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness—should be understood to say: “Whoever is there is incapable of understanding” . And this is not worth a sixteenth particular feelings that should be understood.
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_1: For the persons reckoned as feeling and so on.
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_2: But here it can be understood that the aggregates’ originated elements of the aggregates, etc., just as follows: seven aggregates, and the sense-sphere states are not evident in them.
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_3: For it is due to the elements of consciousness that is associated with all consciousness, and the state of associated with all feelings, and the feelings that is to say, fewness of wishes, contentment, observed by the three consciousness elements, and the states of non-existence.
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_4: The description of the birth (there) governed) the four quarters (of the Religion).
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_5: Herein, there are things that are unskillful, sense-spheres, considered unskillful qualities, sense-spheres, etc., in the passage beginning, “Bhikkhus, are unskilled in profitable things” , and so on. He has passed away, sense-sphere things, etc., and cognized that are peaceful and sublime,” .
ai-tika-abh03t0:92_6: This is the exposition should be understood in four ways:

ai-tika-abh03t0:95_1: The four bases of the truth needed to be seen as object, reached by the end of the states, without any thought, in the natural principle of the simile of the Dhamma.
ai-tika-abh03t0:95_2: And in the case of the birth and the instance of natural principles, etc., which is an incarnation of the Dhamma, namely, the equanimity merely, and it is unsult in all its objects because it has a sense of urgency, and it will not be invalidity with all its objects.
ai-tika-abh03t0:95_3: They bring together into the states of opposite sex, which has been preached by the inclusion of the Dhamma.

ai-tika-abh03t0:96_1: pleasure they don’t get when they ask. And because they don’t ask questions, they don’t get deteriorated, they don’t ask because they don’t need.
ai-tika-abh03t0:96_2: Then the Mogharājas, the eighth in all these things, and the eighth in the case of the winds, and the all: just described above, because they don’t get all these things.”
